//Problem code: CDZ14A
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int T, r, g, b, i, len, ans;
    string str;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
	cin >> str;
	len = str.size();

	r = g = b = 0; ans = 100000;
	for(i=0; i<len; i++)
	{
	    if(str[i] == 'R')
		r = i + 1;
	    else if(str[i] == 'G')
		g = i + 1;
	    else if(str[i] == 'B')
		b = i + 1;
	
	if(r&&g&&b)
	    ans = min(ans, (max(max(r,g),b) - min(min(r,g),b) + 1));
	}
	printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
return 0;
}
